Name: Royal Romances: Battle of the Woods Collector's Edition
About the game: This time you will find yourself in the shoes of different characters, get to know the unique story of each of them, meet new friends and change the story by making your own choices! There are many exciting adventures waiting for you in each part of our new game series! Magic, love, magical creatures, mysteries - you have to deal with all of this, solving numerous puzzles along the way and searching for items, playing your favorite hidden object scenes! Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure! This Collector's Edition includes: - Make choices and change and choose your end of the story! - Play and re-play your favorite puzzles and mini-games to earn a variety of achievements! - Enjoy bonus materials! - Keep an eye out for different collectibles!
